node.doctext:
This nodelet simply contains a list of links to various nodes you might find interesting. If so, enabling this nodelet saves you from having to bookmark these links elsewhere. The nodes listed are:

  • Nodes You Wrote (for listing your own write-ups)
  • Super Search (*)
  • Perl Monks User Search (for listing the write-ups of any arbitrary user)
  • Newest Nodes (*)
  • Recently Active Threads (*)
  • Selected Best Nodes
  • Best Nodes
  • Worst Nodes
  • Saints in our Book
(* These links are redundant with links in the "menu bar" normally displayed at the top of every page.)
node.title: About the Find Nodes Nodelet
